metadata.title: 5509-1 -- Dovecot vulnerability
metadata.description: Julian Brook discovered that Dovecot incorrectly handled multiple passdb configuration entries. In certain configurations, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5509-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dovecot-auth-lua - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-mysql - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-core - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-sieve - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-ldap - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-dev - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-imapd - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-lucene - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-solr - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-submissiond - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.3.13+dfsg1-1ubuntu3.1 No subscription required
